mapper.insert: insert into dtx_transaction (tran_id, model, class_name, method, param, status, create_time, update_time) values (#{tranId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{model,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{className,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{param,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select tran_id, model, class_name, method, param, status, create_time, update_time from dtx_transaction
mapper.update:
update dtx_transaction
status = #{status},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where tran_id = #{tranId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
